mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tyshxydm AS "tyshxydm", a.zzjgdm AS "zzjgdm", a.name AS "name", a.cellphone AS "cellphone", a.url AS "url", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO corp_account_resetpass_application( id, tyshxydm, zzjgdm, name, cellphone, url, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag, remarks, proc_ins_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tyshxydm}, #{zzjgdm}, #{name}, #{cellphone}, #{url}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{procInsId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE corp_account_resetpass_application SET tyshxydm = #{tyshxydm}, zzjgdm = #{zzjgdm}, name = #{name}, cellphone = #{cellphone}, url = #{url}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, proc_ins_id = #{procInsId} WHERE id = #{id}
